metadata.title: CVE-2020-28974 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A slab-out-of-bounds read in fbcon in the Linux kernel before 5.9.7 couldbe used by local attackers to read privileged information or potentiallycrash the kernel, aka CID-3c4e0dff2095. This occurs because KD_FONT_OP_COPYin drivers/tty/vt/vt.c can be used for manipulations such as font height.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-28974` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
